name: Retro Remakes
description:
Retro Remakes is not only one but three games. They are remakes of great classics from the Amiga 500 computer:

  • Roller Maze (remake of Rock'n'Rol): guide a ball through a perilous maze to the exit
  • Lemurs (remake of Lemmings): help a horde of lemurs to survive and find a new home by giving them orders
  • Oil Tycoon (remake of Black Gold / Oil Imperium): manage an oil company - buy land, sell oil, and cheat on the other players

The games are almost feature complete and stay as true as possible to their inspirations. At the moment, Lemurs features 2 levels and Roller Maze 3 levels but more are in the works and will be added over time. I am also thinking about a method for importing your own levels later on.

If you are interested in how these games were made and want to make similar games, you can find the Unity project for them in the Asset Store: Retro Remakes Project in the Asset Store
